com.metrics.common.webservice

Class WsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metrics.common.webservice.WsClient

  • public class WsClient
extends Object
    Client that makes requests to a specified web service. Caller should create one client per web service url.
    Author:
    elangenbach

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WsClient(com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer solrServer, String path)
      Constructor taking a solr server (e.g., as configured in the workstation) using default response handler.
      WsClient(com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer solrServer, String path, WsResponseHandler respHandler)
      Constructor taking a solr server (e.g., as configured in the workstation).
      WsClient(String url)
      Constructor using default response handler and no authentication.
      WsClient(String host, String path)
      Constructor taking a solr server host (e.g., as configured in the workstation) using default response handler.
      WsClient(String url, String user, String pwd)
      Constructor using default response handler.
      WsClient(String url, String user, String pwd, WsResponseHandler respHandler)
      Constructor taking args.
      WsClient(String host, String path, WsResponseHandler respHandler)
      Constructor taking a solr server host (e.g., as configured in the workstation).

      Constructor

        Constructor taking args.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the web service.
        user - User to authenticate with. Can be null.
        pwd - Password to authenticate with. Can be null.
        responseHandler - The response handler. Can be null.

        WsException
